body: Although fusion reactors are superficially similar to fission reactors, the fact that their source of fuel is little more than seawater makes them much safer to operate.
name: Fusion Reactor
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifacts/Power Generators/Fusion Reactor

Fusion Reactor.Explosion: 10d6 bludgeoning and 10d6 fire and 10d6 electricity (100-ft. radius; Reflex DC 20 half)
